ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_1031_02_10:
Yup!
I looked so cute just now!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_1031_03_10:
Look at me!
I need compliments!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_01_10:
Ooh, so cute! Soooo cute! And stylish!
I love it, I love it, I love it!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_02_10:
I’m complimenting myself and my Pokémon to get
us fired up.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_03_10: I can’t be outdone by these Pasio party girls!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_04_10: My Pokémon and I are the cutest in the world!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0702_01_10:
I get to decide what’s stylish and what’s not,
by the way.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0702_02_10:
The same way I choose whatever Pokémon I
like to accompany me around, I choose to wear
whatever fashion I like.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_1031_01_10:
She’s so cute when she
tilts her head to the side.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_1031_02_10:
Her teeth are nice and
straight, and she doesn’t
have any cavities!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_1031_03_10:
Uh-oh! Did I scare you?
Oh, I’m sorry. I know you
don’t like scary things.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0701_02_10:
That’s because I brush her beautiful, sharp fangs
every day!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0701_04_10: Cleanliness is very important, after all!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0702_01_10: My Granbull is such a timid little princess.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0702_02_10:
She likes to look her best, but she gets scared
when people stare.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_1031_02_10:
I can’t be afraid.
I have to try to be nice.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_1031_03_10:
I want to make friends.
Just need some courage...
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0701_02_10:
The Pokémon Center is where all the latest
trends start, so there’s always a lot of people.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0701_03_10:
You can usually see some friends, and there will
always be people you don’t know.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0701_04_10:
If there’s someone you’re interested in, maybe
you can make friends with them. You need the
courage to talk to them first, though...
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0702_01_10:
I got up the courage to say something,
but I forgot to ask if we could be friends.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0702_02_10:
But if I keep going to the Pokémon Center,
I’m sure I’ll get another chance!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_1031_01_10:
Can’t be burned, huh?
That’s pretty surprising.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_1031_02_10:
I wonder, is there anything
more fashionable?
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_1031_03_10:
With a passive skill, 
I’ll be a very capable girl.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0701_01_10:
Once you and your Pokémon get strong enough,
you’ll learn a passive skill.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0701_02_10:
Passive skills are special capabilities of sync pairs.
They can stop you from being burned and stuff.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0701_03_10: I can’t wait to see what passive skill we’ll learn!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0702_01_10:
If I had a passive skill that kept me from
being burned...
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0702_02_10:
maybe I could drink hot coffee without cooling
it off first!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1031_02_10:
Emotes can say way
more than words can.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1031_03_10:
I use waaay too
many emotes...
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1032_01_10:
I dream about emotes
all day long...
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1032_02_10:
Sometimes I spam
them during battles.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1032_03_10:
I’m totally hooked on
emote spamming!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_01_10:
When you want to communicate during a Pokémon
battle, emotes are totally super useful.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_03_10: Oh, you do?! We’re, like, so good together!
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_04_10:
You can literally say anything with emotes,
like “TYVM!” or “Yeet!” or “Hundo P!”
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_06_10: Maybe we should, like, just talk with emotes?
ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_07_10: I think that may be a little too much.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/1902_0101_01_10:
Hey! Look me in the eyes! There!
All right—let’s battle.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/1902_0601_01_10:
When Trainers’ eyes meet, it might be time for a
Pokémon battle.
ch0079_00_miniskirt/1902_0601_02_10: Or I’ve also heard that you might fall in love.
